citation.title: Is No Election News Good News?

author.name: jhodson 🇨🇦
author.description: Assistant Professor and Program Head, MA Interdisciplinary Studies, Royal Roads University. Digital researcher & critical theorist. RTs do not = endorsements.

blogs.title: ARTICLE: Twitter is no substitute to local news outlets
blogs.summary: Focus of political conversation on Twitter is on the national rather than the local level, write Jaigris Hodson, of Royal Roads University, Canada and April Lindgren, of Ryerson University, Canada. They analysed over 19 000 Twitter messages related to the

news.title: When a squirrel dies: The rapid decline of local news
news.summary: Once, when discussing our changing habits online, Mark Zuckerberg told his colleagues, “a squirrel dying in your front yard may be more relevant to your interests right now than people dying in Africa.” This memorable though insensitive quote…

news.summary: Once, when discussing our changing habits online, Mark Zuckerberg told his colleagues, “a squirrel dying in your front yard may be more relevant to your interests right now than people dying in Africa.” This memorable though insensitive quote…
